archimate:TechnologyService.name: Energy Requote Consumer
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
The energy re-quote consumer is responsible for:
Reading re-quotes from SQS (put on by energy-requote-service) Transforming a re-quote object into the corresponding classes for the files that we upload to Salesforce Uploading temp batch CSV files to S3 for energy-requote-uploader to handle
